articles.description: Cricket News: Largely thanks to the current BCCI administration led by its secretary Jay Shah, the marquee T20 property has now carved out an extended window for it

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Last year ka tha na?': Suryakumar Yadav's epic response on Edgbaston defeat - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Suryakumar Kumar had a hilarious response to a journalist, who asked him about India's defeat in the final Test match at Edgbaston in Birmingham.
articles.content: With the series level at 1-1, Team India will be aiming for a win in the third and final ODI against England, at Old Trafford in Manchester on Sunday. The visitors were humbled in the second ODI with… [+1894 chars]

articles.author: Venkat
articles.title: Reports: Virat Kohli to take a break from cricket.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: Ex-Team India captain Virat Kohli will take a break from cricket and will stay back in London after the conclusion of the ongoing series against England, as per reports.
articles.content:
Ex-Team India captain Virat Kohli will take a break from cricket and will stay back in London after the conclusion of the ongoing series against England, as per reports.
